abstract.t: End-by-Hop Transmission Protocol (EHTP) is the connection-orientedtransport service for the reliable or unreliable delivery of datapackets with possible violation of a sequence. It has the ownaddress space compatible with Unified Memory Space Protocol (UMSP,RFC3018 [5]). EHTP includes the gateway protocol, which supportslabels and dynamic resources deallocating. Networks with non-overlapping or incompatible addresses space may be united at EHTPlayer with end-to-end interaction and with preservation of atransparency.
